title: Custom Page Route with Multiple Transitions
description: Create a reusable custom page route that supports multiple transition types.
instructions: Build a CustomPageRoute class that accepts a TransitionType enum (fade, slideUp, slideRight, scale) and applies the appropriate transition. Then demonstrate using it with Navigator.push() for different screens.

hints.text: Use a switch statement on the TransitionType enum in transitionsBuilder
For slideUp, use Offset(0, 1) as the begin value (1 = 100% of screen height)
Combine ScaleTransition with FadeTransition for the scale effect

commonMistakes.mistake: Not applying a curve to the animation
commonMistakes.consequence: Linear animations feel robotic and unnatural
commonMistakes.correction: Use CurvedAnimation with Curves.easeOutCubic for natural deceleration
